songs.title: Jack and the Harlots
songs.lyrics:
I hear your knees crumble to the ground, (BooHoo!)
Did the knife in yout guts said
You're part of the odss now?
That's right so sad
Mary that's one pretty hat
Honey this isn't that bad
If you care about your image so

(Pre)
The stains matches that dress
The more you move, the more you bleed
Is a matter of time

(Chorus)
Killing is a lot like dancing
I held your hand, you stabbed me
Killing is a lot like dancing
I held your hand, you stabbed my heart!
(You stabbed my heart! x4)

You've got a mail
The content it's half the kidney
That I used to feed myself
Gotta hold me or stop me now
Stop me now!

You should hurry up and catch me
'Cause the closest that you've gotten to me
Is hear the screaming last words
Beneath my shadow!

(Pre)
The stains matches that dress
The more you move, the more you bleed
Is a matter of time

(Chorus)
Killing is a lot like dancing
I held your hand, you stabbed me, (2x)

Killing is a lot like dancing, looooot
(Solo)

(Pre)
The stains matches that dress
The more you move, the more you bleed
Is a matter of time

(Chorus)
Killing is a lot like dancing
I held your hand, you stabbed me, (2x)
Woooooooo (3x)
You stabbed me
You stabbed my heart!
